title: Downward Cable Wood Chops
description: Adjust the pulley lever to be above you. Stand next to a pulley machine with your left side. Grab the handle with both hands. Brace your core and separate your feet to outside of shoulder width. Begin the movement by twisting with your obliques to pull the handle down and across your body. Once the handle is on the right side of your body, pause and slowly return the handle to the starting position.
